room_title: Escape room "Cabin Fever Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: My 13-year-old son and I did the Cabin Fever room today. We had a blast! Made it with 4 seconds left. Was a great way to spend some time working together and honestly he did more than me. Juan was great to work with and really kept an eye on us. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Fever Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: We loved the entire experience. Our team of 6 ladies was able to escape in 43 minutes from the Cabin Fever game. Our host, Mandi did a great job at setting the context and helping us work through a few clues.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Fever Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Leo was the best! We had an amazing time escaping the ski lodge cabin.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Fever Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Nathan was awesome and we were so close to finishing the room... we forgot one chess piece. Lmbo! Amazing time and I can't wait to try again!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin Fever Room" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: Love this place. The cabin room was really fun and challenging. ..Leila was awesome!!! Will definitely return to experience other rooms.
